A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Right\, it's time to take my turn on this film. Episode VIII is bit diferent than the VII. In many ways the film kind of kills off loads of previous storylines and also the hype surrounding few characters and fan theories. I liked bit light approach with the jokes. I liked the film but this \"Skywalker\" Storyline is tired. End it well and never come back with any other sequel.
